entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
